member.name: T:Starcounter.Internal.AppsBootstrapper
member.summary: Sets up the REST, Resources and Apps modules
member.remarks: A common dependency injection pattern for all bootstrapping in Starcounter should be considered for a future version. This includes Apps, SQL and other modules.

member.summary: Adding static files directory.

member.name: M:Starcounter.Internal.AppsBootstrapper.Bootstrap(System.UInt16,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Function that registers a default handler in the gateway and handles incoming requests and dispatch them to Apps. Also registers internal handlers for jsonpatch.
The should be a fully qualified, rooted directory path pointing to the logical application root. The implementation of this method has no advice on how that path is resolved in the first place; its up to the caller.

member.summary: Default size for static serialization buffer.

member.summary: Entry-point for all external HTTP requests from the Network Gateway.

member.name: T:Starcounter.Internal.Web.AppRestServer
member.summary: Wraps the file based http web resource resolver and the App view model resolver.
member.remarks: Supports Http as well as proprietary protocols. If the URI does not point to a App view model or a user implemented handler, the request is routed to a standard file based static resource web serving implementation that will serve html, png, jpg etc. using the file system. This file based resolver will be injected into the constructor of this class.

member.name: F:Starcounter.Internal.Web.AppRestServer.fileServerPerPort_
member.summary: A standard file based static resource web serving implementation. Will serve html, png, jpg etc. using the file system. If the URI does not point to a App view model or a user implemented handler, this is where the request will go.

member.name: M:Starcounter.Internal.Web.AppRestServer.#ctor(System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary{System.UInt16,Starcounter.Internal.Web.StaticWebServer})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets the exception string.

member.summary: Runs delegate and process response.

member.summary: This is where the AppServer calls to get a resource from the file system.

member.name: M:Starcounter.Internal.Web.AppRestServer.UserAddedLocalFileDirectoryWithStaticContent(System.String,System.UInt16,System.String)
member.summary: Sent from the Node when the user runs a module (an .EXE).
member.remarks: There is no need to add the directory to the static resolver as the static resolver will already be bootstrapped as a lower priority handler for stuff that this AppServer does not handle.
